nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,31 @@
+# Overides the project file and CHANGELOG.md for the template project using the next publishable version
+# This is to help with testing the release pipeline.
+. "${PSScriptRoot}\..\common\scripts\common.ps1"
+$latestTags = git tag -l "azure-sdk-template*beta*"

nodes.bodyText: Am trying to not have to filter sort with the preview version. I don't assume we need to publish a GA version from the template pipeline.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,31 @@
+# Overides the project file and CHANGELOG.md for the template project using the next publishable version
+# This is to help with testing the release pipeline.
+. "${PSScriptRoot}\..\common\scripts\common.ps1"

nodes.bodyText: This script is called SetTestePipelineVersion.ps1 but it really is specific to the template package. Not a big deal but it seems a little miss-leading. When you come back around to clean this up a little we should consider a way to share the common parts of this in eng/common and then call the language specific version incrementing and changelog update.
